item.title: Brno Data
item.description: Brno Data #brno2050 Open Data Home Contact What is DATA.BRNO? DATA.BRNO.cz is an open platform for sharing data of the city of Brno. This portal is designed to be used by public including citizens, entrepreneurs, students, researchers and professionals, as well as journalists and developers. WHY? Data is our “new urban wealth” and we need to use it to full capacity.

item.title: Open Data
item.description: Open Data Home Brno Data Definition Open data is according to the § 3 odst. 11 zákona č. 106⁄1999 Sb. o svobodném přístupu k informacím: Information published such that it allows for remote access in open, machine-readable format which purpose and further usage is in no way limited and which is registered in national open data catalogue.
